Tests manager test_run >>

test_makeref

Creates a '.ref' file for a test

Syntax

status = test_makeref(filename)

Input argument

filename

a string: filename, a test file.

Output argument

status

a logical: true if .ref was generated.

Description

test_makeref function creates a '.ref' file from a test file.

test file must have <--CHECK REF--> tag.

See also

test_run.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
